title: "[FEAT] Example Apple Machine"
labels: enhancement

---

**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Ex. I'm always frustrated when I can't find apples, so you should make a machine that helps collect apples.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. Ex. I want a machine that rolls around like a turtle with wheelies and picks up apples for me.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered. Ex. I will also accept ice skates instead of wheelies.

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
